segments.text: Hello Mike . How are things going for you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Kara , I had a great time the other night and was wondering if you would like to go out again this weekend .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Mike , I enjoyed your company , but I am getting ready to graduate soon . I really need to focus on my studies .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Maybe I could help you with what you need to get done .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It would be better for me to just deal with getting my work done , but thank you for a lovely dinner .
segments.speaker: S2
